oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Truth Or Consequences - 1943-04-17 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Truth Or Consequences game show from April 17, 1943, part 2. Hosted by Ralph Edwards with announcer Cliff Engle and contestants Pvt. Bernard Litt, Pvt. Collins Weehunt, Bill Dague, Maurice Hook, Kansas Governor Andrew Schoeppel, and Betty Wright (contestant names unconfirmed). Features a performance by the Kansas City Symphony conducted by Dr. N. De Rubertis, with guest vocalist Betty Wright. Sponsored by Duz Soap.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Kansas City Symphony; Betty Wright
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Game show competition [continued from part 1] -- Ralph Edwards introduces the Kansas City Symphony Orchestra and conductor Dr. N. De Rubertis -- Seguidilla (Betty Wright, Kansas City Symphony) -- Duz Soap commercial (Ralph Edwards, Cliff Engel, Mrs Harry K. Allen) -- Announcement of grand prize winner -- Closing statement (Ralph Edwards)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: National Broadcasting Company; Truth or consequences (Radio program); Engle, Cliff; Edwards, Ralph, 1913-2005; Schoeppel, Andrew Frank, 1894-1962; Kansas City Symphony; Rubertis, N. de
